did.unittitle: Robert Doherty Collection of Rochester, NY, Board of Education Conference and SUNY Clippings
did.abstract: This collection of news clippings also includes the audio tape and transcript of an interview with ILR professor, Jean McKelvey.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Robert Doherty Collection of Rochester, NY, Board of Education Conference and SUNY Clippings #/3038. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
